problems.title: Maximum Vowels in Substring of Length K
problems.description:
Given a string s and an integer k, return the maximum number of vowel letters in any substring of s with length k.
Vowel letters in English are 'a', 'e', 'i', 'o', and 'u'.

Input Format:
First line: string s (no spaces).
Second line: integer k.

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the maximum number of vowels in any window of size k.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
abciiidef
3

Sample Output
3

Explanation:
The substring "iii" contains 3 vowels.
problems.constraints:
1 <= |s| <= 100000
1 <= k <= |s|
s consists of lowercase English letters.
hintsList: Use a sliding window of size k.
Count vowels in the first window, then slide one char at a time, updating the count.
